name: runasjs-prismjs-plugin
description: runJavascript is a prism js plugin which will run the javascript inside the code block.

directories.example: example of the runAsJs prismJs plugin

scripts.postCss: npx postcss css/**/*.css --base css --dir dist/runAsJs/css -u cssnano
scripts.build: npx del-cli dist/runAsJs/* && npm run postCss && npx rollup -c rollup.config.js

author: karthikeyan-cool
